mdRecord.dcterms:description: Right arm, seen from the south

Gift of Mr. John Thomas Lupton. Cost: $2,000. This sculpture is a bronze cast of the life-size marble portrait of George Washington made by Jean Antoine Houdon for the Virginia capitol in Richmond. -- https://siris-artinventories.si.edu/ipac20/ipac.jsp?uri=full=3100001~!317770~!7&ri=19&aspect=basic&menu=search&source=~!siartinventories&profile=ariall [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: James Murray Howard University of Virginia Historic Buildings and Grounds Collection
